import React from 'react' function PizzaBlock({title, price, imageUrl, sizes, types}) { const [activeType, setActiveType] = React.useState(0) const typeNames = ['тонкое', 'традиционное'] return (

{title}

    { types.map(type =>
  • {typeNames[type]}
    • ) }
    { sizes.map(size =>
  • {size} см.
    • ) }
от {price} ₽
); } export default PizzaBlock;
